name: harbor
description: Harbor - Browser extensions for AI capabilities
author: Raffi Krikorian <raffi.krikorian@gmail.com>

scripts.build:firefox: npm run build --prefix extension && npm run build --prefix web-agents-api
scripts.build:chrome: npm run build:chrome --prefix extension && npm run build:chrome --prefix web-agents-api
scripts.build:safari: npm run build:safari --prefix extension && npm run build:safari --prefix web-agents-api
scripts.build:all: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:safari
scripts.clean: rm -rf extension/dist extension/dist-* extension/bundled web-agents-api/dist web-agents-api/dist-*
scripts.install:deps: npm install --prefix extension && npm install --prefix web-agents-api && npm install --prefix tests/e2e
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:ts && npm run test:unit:rust
scripts.test:setup: npm run build && cd bridge-rs && cargo build --release && ./install.sh --firefox-only --skip-build
